text: The water level in the Mettur Dam stood at 83.94 feet on Friday against its full level of 120 feet. The storage in the dam was 45.995 tmc against its full capacity of 93.470 tmc. The dam was receiving an inflow of 192 cusecs. About 15,000 cusecs of water is discharged from the dam for Samba cultivation in the Cauvery delta region. Another 400 cusecs is let out for irrigation activities under the dam’s East-West canal system in Salem, Namakkal and Erode districts, sources said.
title: Mettur level
